location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: Covering letter for a register [not transcribed] of two sets of bills of exchange drawn by Henry Willock, His Majesty's Charg√© d'Affaires at Tehran for subsidiary payment by the Bombay Government. The bills were in connection with His Majesty's mission [to Persia]. Riach adds that Catchatoor Johannes had negotiated the sale of the bills at Shiraz.
